name: Net Buzz
measure: The net of Positive and Negative Buzz

name: Positive Buzz
measure: Which of the following womenswear retailers have your heard something POSITIVE about in the last month?

name: Negative Buzz
measure: Which of the following retailers have your heard something NEGATIVE about in the last month?

name: Familiarity
measure: How would you describe your opinion of the following WOMENSWEAR retailers? - with an opinion of the brand

name: Affinity
measure: Have you seen ADVERTISING for any of the following retailers in the last month?

name: Love
measure: How would you describe your opinion of the following WOMENSWEAR retailers?

name: Consideration
measure: When, if ever, have you bought womenswear from the following retailer? - "Do not know them"

name: Preference
measure: How would you describe your opinion of the following WOMENSWEAR retailers?

name: Never Consider
measure: How would you describe your opinion of the following WOMENSWEAR retailers?

name: Visited In-Store (LM)
measure: Which of the following retailers have you VISITED IN-STORE in the last month?

name: Visited Online (LM)
measure: Which of the following retailers have you VISITED ONLINE in the last month?

name: Visited Overall (LM)
measure: Visited the retailer in-store OR online in the last month

name: Bought In-Store (LM)
measure: Of the retailers you visited IN-STORE, from which did you PURCHASE womenswear from in the last month IN-STORE?

name: Bought Online (LM)
measure: Of the retailers you visited ONLINE, from which did you womenswear from in the last month ONLINE?

name: Bought Overall (LM)
measure: Bought from the retailer in-store OR online in the last month

name: Conversion In-Store (LM)
measure: % of those who visited IN-STORE who subsequently purchased

name: Conversion Online (LM)
measure: % of those who visited ONLINE who subsequently purchased

name: Purchase Frequency In-Store (L12M)
measure: How many times have you PURCHASED womenswear from these retailers IN-STORE in the last year?

name: Purchase Frequency Online (L12M)
measure: How many times have you PURCHASED womenswear from these retailers ONLINE in the last year?

name: Spend In-Store (LM)
measure: How much did you spend at each retailer IN-STORE in the last month on womenswear?

name: Spend Online (LM)
measure: How much did you spend at each retailer ONLINE in the last month on womenswear?

name: Penetration (L12M)
measure: When, if ever, have you bought womenswear from the following retailer? - "PURCHASED - in the last 12 months ago"

name: Ever Bought
measure: When, if ever, have you bought womenswear from the following retailer? - "NEVER purchased from them"

name: Lapsed (L12M)
measure: When, if ever, have you bought womenswear from the following retailer? - "PURCHASED - more than 12 months ago"

name: Never Bought
measure: When, if ever, have you bought womenswear from the following retailer? - "PURCHASED - more than 12 months ago"

name: NPS
measure: % Promoters - % Detractors

measure: % Promoters - % Detractors
comment: DO NOT REMOVE OR DEPLOY LIVE - SPECIFIC FOR NEW LOOK

name: Customer
measure: Whether the customer has ever bought and, if so, during what period.
filterValueMapping: 5:0-3 Months|4:4-12 Months|4,5:0-12 Months|3:Lapsed (>12 months)|3,4,5:At any time|!3,4,5:Never

name: The quality of their products (i.e. materials, stitching, etc.)
The range of colours of their products
The range of styles of their products available
Ease of product care for their products (e.g. washing, cleaning)
The retailer generally offers products in your size / fit your body shape
The comfort of wearing products from the retailer
How stylish / on-trend products from the retailer are
The retailer generally offers products that suit your style
The ethical position of their products
Browse item(s) see on their website earlier
Browse item(s) seen in a magazine
Browse item(s) seen in a blog / vlog
Browse item(s) seen on a TV program
Heard something positive from friends / family
To buy gifts / clothes for someone else
Just looking around - not really planning to buy something
The store had a sale on
Received an email / a letter from the retailer
Planned to browse for something new
Was close to other shops I was visiting
How clean and tidy the store was
How long it takes to pay / queue
Availability and condition of fitting rooms
The availability of items in stock, especially in your size
How easy it was to navigate the store / find the sort of items you wanted to browse
The images and videos of the products
Personalized customer service (i.e. through live chat or emails)
Delivery options (deliver to home / work, or collect in-store)
How easy it was to navigate or search the site / find the sort of items you wanted to browse
How closely the products resembled what you were expecting when they arrived
Prices of products at the cheaper end of the retailer's range
Prices of products at the more premium end of the retailer's range
Number of reduced price products available
Number of special offers and the discounts offered
Offers targeted directly to you (e.g. by email)
The regular prices of their products i.e. when not on sale
The range of prices of their products i.e. when you are on a budget or wanting a treat
Sales, discounts and promotions on their products
